"What do you think you're doing?!" the blonde boy screamed at Davis. It's true that he wanted to be the leader's slave, but that was what he wanted. Patamon shouldn't be hurt, not because of his own desires!

The blonde took the hit and jumped at his friend and master, wrestling him down to take the dark ring back off.
His first attempt failed and the two boys exchanged a few hits, before T.K. eventually managed to get the ring off Davis and put it instantly back on.

Davis mind didn't had the time to notice what was going on, instead of coming back to his senses it was more like he was reset and looked with a bland stare at T.K. waiting for his new programming.

But T.K. didn't had time for this, not yet. He rushed over to Patamon, who was still dizzy from being knocked into the tree.
"Hey, I'm sorry, I didn't think that through. Are you alright?" he asked his partner. If he would want to be another persons slave, that'd be fine, but he wouldn't be and added that if T.K. decided to have enough of being someone's bitch he could come back to him.

He didn't had a way of "turning it off" without taking off the dark ring and Davis certainly couldn't be the Digimon Emperor around anyone but him.
